abstract: Keith Meister, a protégé of Carl C. Icahn, and Jeff T. Blau, chief of The Related Companies, disclosed a 9.8 percent ownership stake in CommonWealth REIT on Tuesday.
snippet: Keith Meister, a protégé of Carl C. Icahn, and Jeff T. Blau, chief of The Related Companies, disclosed a 9.8 percent ownership stake in CommonWealth REIT on Tuesday.
lead_paragraph: The activist doesn’t fall far from the tree.

headline.main: A Former Icahn Lieutenant and a Real Estate Giant Demand Change at CommonWealth
